title: Introduction to TypeScript
content: TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript that adds static typing to the language. It is a powerful tool for building scalable and maintainable web applications.

title: Getting Started with React
content: React is a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It allows you to create reusable UI components and efficiently update the DOM.

title: Node.js and Express for Backend Development
content: Node.js and Express are a powerful combination for building scalable and performant backend applications. They allow you to easily create RESTful APIs.

title: Responsive Web Design with CSS Grid and Flexbox
content: Learn how to create responsive and flexible layouts using CSS Grid and Flexbox. These modern CSS features make it easier to design websites for various screen sizes.

title: GraphQL: A Query Language for APIs
content: GraphQL is a query language for APIs that enables clients to request only the data they need. It provides a more efficient and flexible alternative to traditional REST APIs.
